snippet: Ted Ligety, an American skier, won by 1.76 seconds Sunday in Beaver Creek, Colo., but he was not impressed by his performance.
abstract: American skier Ted Ligety wins World Cup giant slalom in Beaver Creek, Colo, in 2 minutes and 25.59 seconds.
lead_paragraph: Ted Ligety, an American skier, won by 1.76 seconds Sunday in Beaver Creek, Colo., but he was not impressed by his performance.

headline.seo: Ted Ligety’s Dominance in Giant Slalom Leaves Rivals Marveling
headline.main: Shattering Records in the Giant Slalom, Ligety Leaves His Rivals Marveling
headline.print_headline: Shattering Records in the Giant Slalom, an American Leaves His Rivals Marveling
